title: Conjurer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Conjure a meteor to deal a Powerful Attack towards a player during the day. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot conjure a meteor Day 1.
- With the Necronomicon, you may deal a Basic Attack to a player each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose the Coven.

desc:
Post 3858
*See? Day Boy Scout has a good use!*
